title: UAT feedback: Update Paragraph 2 logic
custom_preconds: GIVEN that player has a major league contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the major league contract has a Paragraph 2 salary entered

2. WHEN the major league contract has no Paragraph 2 salary entered
custom_expected:
1. THEN Addendum rule check 19.12 and 19.13 run on Add C state changes

AND they run on non 1st year contract state changes

AND the monthly P2 salary is calculated as follows:
(Amount / # of days in the MJ season) X 30
For # of days in the season, calculate including the start and end date for MJ Org in the club system dates. 

2. THEN his P2 salary should be the amount of the value entered into the Major Contract > Major League Compensation > Base Salary in his Major contract for the year that matches the year of the Minor contract

AND the monthly P2 salary is calculated as follows:
(Amount / # of days in the MJ season) X 30
For # of days in the season, calculate including the start and end date for MJ Org in the club system dates.

title: As club/ BOC, I want to be stopped if player is under 21 and I don't complete Parental consent section
custom_preconds: GIVEN that player is under 21 as of the contract signing date
custom_steps: WHEN editing their 1st year international contract,
custom_expected:
THE the Parental Guardian Consent field (in Execution of Contract section) gets a red asterisk (only this one field, not the other 3).
AND If signing date is updated, then hide or show the asterisk accordingly.
AND If the field is required but not populated, then on Submit, show hard error to clubs and over ride to BOC onSubmit
"This player requires Parental/Guardian Consent. Please complete this field to continue"

title: As club/BOC, I want to be stopped if player is not 17 by last game date of minor league season or Sept 1st
custom_preconds:
[Ensure system dates for last game date of the minor league season for that club] is set to a date later in the year
And choose a player who will not yet be 17 by this system date or Sept 1st

GIVEN I am logged in as Club Or BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN I attempt to submit a first year International Contract
AND my player doesnt meet the criteria above
custom_expected:
THEN I will receive hard error for club on submit
AND warning for BOC on submit
This player will not be 17 by the last game date of the Minor League season or September 1st, whichever is earlier

title: UAT Update: Rule 19.3 As Club/BOC, I want to be WARNED if I don't pay the exact intl salary scale for foreign players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as Club or BOC
AND I am on a editable international contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I click edit
AND I edit the salaries in the Add C section
AND they do NOT match up to this scale
2150 for AAA
1500 for AA
1100 for A, SA, RA and R
custom_expected:
THEN the system will show a WARNING FOR CLUB (this has been updated) and warning for BOC on SUBMIT
AND the message is "The salary for level(s) of play [level(s) of play] must be $[required amount] for the first season"

title: As a club/ BOC, I want to view hard errors on submitting a 1st yr intl contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC or CLUB
AND have opened a preliminary contract for an international amateur
custom_steps:
WHEN I fill out the contract
AND I click SUBMIT
custom_expected:
THEN the rule checks will fire as HARD errors for Club and WARNINGS for BOC
[see linked story for rules]

title: As Club/ BOC, I want to be stopped if required fields are missing on 1st yr intl contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as club or BOC
AND I am on an Intl first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN I fill out a first year international contract
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that the following fields are requird and fire errors if not filled out
(see linked story)

title: UAT Feedback: Monthly logic for minor league assignment salary
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating or editing a non-first year Minor League Contract
AND Minor League Assignment Salary clause is toggled to yes
custom_steps: WHEN "Monthly" is selected instead of Annual
custom_expected:
THEN derive the monthly value of the minimum specified in system values using formula (Amount x 30 / # of days in season)
AND compare the monthly amounts entered into the table with the monthly version of the minimum salary
AND show error message if the monthly salary does not meet the monthly minimum. In the error message, show the monthly amount instead of the annual amount.

title: UAT Feedback: Relabel sample assignment clause language
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a non-first year minor league contract
custom_steps: WHEN the Minor League Miscellaneous clause is toggled on in the Addendum B
custom_expected:
THEN the default language should be named "BOC - Sample Language for Assignment Clause"
AND the body of the language should say "THIS LANGUAGE SHOULD BE COPY PASTED INTO CUSTOM LANGUAGE" at the top

title: UAT Upadte: Rule 19.6 As Club/BOC, I want to be WARNED if I don't pay the exact domestic salary scale for US players
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a CLUB or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN First Year Domestic Contracts
AND the salaries entered must be exactly equal to $1100 for AAA, AA, A, SA RA and R
AND on Submit if the rule fails
custom_expected: THEN the OVERRIDABLE WARNING will display FOR BOTH CLUB AND BOC (this has been updated): "The salary for level(s) of play [level(s) of play] must be $[required amount] for the first season"

title: As BOC, I want to be warned if more than 12 players have been signed for next year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN contract is being signed for next year (see Beginning in year field in Add A), 
AND the current date is on or after July 1st
AND and there are already 12 or more players on this affiliate's roster with Roster status of "Signed for Next Year"
AND on "Submit"
custom_expected: THEN warning shows "You have surpassed the twelve man limit for first year players signed for next season"

title: UAT Update: Rule 5.24, As Club, I want to be BLOCKED if more than 12 players have been signed for next year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Club
custom_steps:
WHEN contract is being signed for next year (see Beginning in year field in Add A), 
AND the current date is on or after July 1st
AND and there are already 12 or more players on this affiliate's roster with Roster status of "Signed for Next Year"
AND on "Submit"
custom_expected: THEN a HARD ERROR shows "You have surpassed the twelve man limit for first year players signed for next season" (This has been updated)

title: As club / BOC, I can search for international amateurs using quick search
custom_steps:
Both BOC and club users can switch quick search to "International Amateur Players" option
WHEN typing a player's name into quick search
position and "International Amateur" as the subheader (similar to Domestic amateur)
custom_expected:
THEN users see results similar to Pro and Domestic search
AND The population of players available in the quick search are limited to players whose 'eligible to sign date' is today or in the past. 
AND and must not be a hidden profile
AND all players in the population are visibile to everybody
AND Format as Last name, Legal First name Middle Initial. - Home Country abbreviated - Date of Birth
                Example 1: Johnson, Jack R. - DR - 5/30/1995
AND On clicking on a result, user is taken to a profile. For this story, the profile just needs a player header with MLB logo, the player's last, roster name,

title: As club/BOC, I can view Contract History on international amateur profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing an int'l amateur profile
custom_expected:
THEN If the player has no contracts, then hide the Contract History tab (similar to domestic)
AND If the player has a contract in any state, then show the Contract History tab for that player
AND In both cases, add the "Create new" icon to the Player header (similar to domestic)
AND Should work for both BOC and Club

title: As club/ BOC, I can view basic info on international amateurs
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player from international amateur quick search
custom_expected:
THEN load the player's profile with player header. "International Amateur" should be displayed beneath the player name.

AND show the following fields in the secondary header:
- Eligible to Sign (Per Reg Requirements)
- Meets Age Requirement
- Player ID
- Birth Date
- Birth Country
- Home Country
- Level 1 Registered
- Level 2 Registered

title: As club, I want to be stopped from creating a a preliminary contract if one exists for my org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club
AND have already saved a preliminary contract for an international amateur player
custom_steps: WHEN I attempt to save a second preliminary contract for same player as same club
custom_expected:
THEN I should get an error message on CREATE
(Error does not exist for BOC)
[see linked story for error]

title: As a club, I want to give some users read only access to Minor league contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as read-cin-mnc/journal2810
custom_steps: WHEN user views ebis
custom_expected:
THEN the user can view MNC widgets and records but has no edit or state change functionality
AND on contract forms and Addendum C forms, the Edit button, all state change buttons, and E-sign button are not visible. The Print and close buttons continue to stay visible and usable
AND user can view Contract History on player profile but does not have access to Create New button
AND on the Add C widget and Salary structure widget, read only users can see the results but have no buttons. All checkbox selection fields are also hidden
AND user can use MNC advanced search
AND user can receive MNC related notifications and can delete their own notifications (notifications are account specific)
AND E-sig and authorized signatory functions work as they do for admin-cin-all

title: As a club / BOC, I want to create a new first year international contract
custom_steps: WHEN a Club/BOC user navigates to Intl Amateur profile
custom_expected:
THEN they can create a new contract from Player header or from Contract History.
AND If no other contracts exist for the player that are "Terms Submitted" or higher, and user hits Create New, a new contract is created with label "International First-Year" instead of Non 1st yr. Otherwise create non 1st yr
AND The contract is the same as Domestic First year except for the following differences.
- Addendum H is included in the contract. It cannot be removed and therefore has no toggle
- Addendum E also appears on the contract. It is toggled to Yes by default but can be removed/toggled no.
AND 
All other fields work the same as Domestic contracts and must be editable by user
AND If player is under 22 at time of contract creation, show parental consent. See #117960773
AND User can save contract as preliminary. This should now appear in CH (same as Domestic - red font, all appropriate columns populated correctly)
AND Include Delete function in preliminary state

title: As Club/BOC, I want to search for 1st yr intl contracts
custom_steps: WHEN user searches for 1st year international minor contracts in advanced search
custom_expected:
THEN 1st yr intl contracts show in contract search results and can be clicked into the actual contract
AND User can also search for these contracts by Contract Type filter
AND All implemented filters and operators should now work for 1st yr intl contracts

title: As club/ BOC, I want to be warned if player needs a status check
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a new 1st year int'l contract
custom_expected:
THEN if player's home or Birth country is Taiwan, Japan or South Korea, show ignore warning to club

**Body:** This player may require an active Asian Status Check before you can create a new contract.
**Hint:** Please contact BOC for details

AND this rule is triggered on clicking the Minor Contract option in the Create new menu

title: As club/ BOC, I want to view over-rideable warnings when submitting a 1st yr intl contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN submitting terms for a 1st year intl contract
custom_expected:
THEN run the rule checks in the test cases listed below as WARNINGs (for both club and BOC):
[109746](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109746)
[109747](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109747)
[109750](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/109750)
[185817](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/185817)

title: As a user, I want the create new icon to default to contracts on amateur profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as club OR BOC
AND I've navigated to an AMATEUR players profile
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the create new Icon
custom_expected:
THEN the create new icon for DOM and Intl Amateurs default to 'contracts
AND the transactions, MJC and ADD C options are  removed
AND for INTL players, Place on NES is the only tx available

title: As BOC, I want only limited users to be able to approve MN contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as read only BOC account
custom_steps: WHEN I view the approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to view all information
BUT all buttons and checkboxes are disabled

title: As a club, I want only limited users to have permissions to create and edit stored e-signatures (read-only)
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged as a read only club with esig permissions
custom_steps: WHEN I view Esign
custom_expected:
THEN Read only e-sig users can see the Player, club and Authorized signatory widget but do not have access to any buttons. Checkboxes are not visible
AND Read only e-sig users cannot see E-sign button on forms
AND Read only e-sig users cannot see the "new" button on transactions, contracts and Add C forms next to the Authorized signatory field

title: As a club, I want only limited users to have permissions to create and edit stored e-signatures (admin)
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club with admin esign permissions
custom_steps: WHEN I view Esign
custom_expected: THEN I have access to all e-sig functionality including player and club e-sig widgets, e-sig buttons on forms, the Authorized signatory widget and the "new" option on forms

title: As club/BOC, I want to see 1st yr Intl contracts from ebis 1 in ebis 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club/BOC
custom_steps:
1) WHEN player has 1st intl contract from ebis 1

2) WHEN a 1st year intl contract from ebis 1 is opened in ebis 2
custom_expected:
1)THEN it should correctly appear in Player history in ebis 2 [113003061](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/113003061)

2) THEN it should display correctly [117066677](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/117066677)
    AND attachments from ebis 1 should show on ebis 2 [113648521](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/113648521)
    AND Addendum Cs are formatted correctly [117067011](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/117067011)
    AND ebis 1 contracts states are correctly translated into ebis 2 states [117540411](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/117540411)

title: As a club/ BOC, I want to submit Terms on my 1st yr international contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as Club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN I open a 1st year INTL saved/preliminary contract that has not yet been submitted
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to submit terms on the contract successfully
AND the buttons update accordingly
AND the status updates to Terms Submitted

title: As club/ BOC, I want to add a dual sport or signing bonus with Visa Contingency
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in Club or BOC
AND I am viewing an international first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I click Add Terms in ADD B
AND I Add clauses for dual sport and signing bonus with Visa Contingency
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to add/delete rows
AND the clauses show with a Visa Contingency checkbox
AND user can only choose 1 of the 4 clauses [toggling yes to one will toggle the other 3 to NO automatically]

title: As club, I want to add an Age and Identity fraud clause to my contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club
AND I am viewing an editable first year Intl Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I click on Add Terms on Add B Section (appears under the Incentive Bonus clause
AND I add an Age and Idenity Fraud Clause to my contract
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that the clause has been added
AND there is only a language selection field
AND required fields are marked with a red asterisk
AND clause can be toggled to YES/NO

title: As BOC, I want to give read only access to some users to Minor league contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC read only account
custom_steps: WHEN I login with this account
custom_expected:
THEN I can do the following -
-View MNC widgets but cannot edit anything
-Viewing contracts and Add C's, only print and close buttons available
-Can veiw contract history but NO create new button
-Can see approvals widget but no buttons
-Can receieve notifications
-Cannot see esign or auth sig widget YET

title: As BOC, I want 1st yr intl contracts to automatically expire or terminate when player is made a free agent or released
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC admin
AND I have located a 1st year intl amateur player with an existing contract in TA or higher
custom_steps:
WHEN I 
(1) Release this player - via Transactions
(2) Declare player a free agent - via Transactions
custom_expected:
THEN
(1) Players contract is automatically terminated. Comments in his MNC are updated with termination information. Contract history and everything else updated to terminated
(2)Players contract is automatically expired. Comments in MNC are updated with expiration info. Contract history and everything else is updated to expired

title: As BOC, I can Reject, withdraw or void  a 1st yr intl contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in a BOC
AND have located an Intl 1st Year Contract that is Terms Accepted or Pre approved
custom_steps:
WHEN I
(1) Reject (either from TA or Preapproved)
(2) Withdraw (either from TA or Pre-approved)
(3) Void  (Approved Contract)
custom_expected:
THEN
(1) Contract is rejected. BOC Can enter reasons for rejecting and player is taken off roster and any transactions are reversed. BOC can also delete this rejected contract
(2) Player is removed from roster on withdrawal. BOC Can delete a withdrawn Contract
(3) BOC Can enter reasons for voiding. All txs are reversed.

title: As BOC, I want to approve a 1st yr intl contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND I am viewing the MNC Verifications Widget
AND I can see a pre approved contract in this widget
custom_steps: WHEN I Click on Approve button on my contract
custom_expected:
THEN the contract is approved
AND players roster status and player history are populated
AND Boc can reattach and stamp contract

title: As BOC, I want to view errors and warnings when pre-approving a contract that was pending investigations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have located a contract that  is Pending Investigation > Preapproved
custom_steps: WHEN I attempt to pre approve the contract
custom_expected: THEN all rule checks in linked story must be run

title: As BOC, I want to pre-approve a contract that has completed investigations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have opened a pending investigation contract from Contract History
custom_steps:
WHEN I view this contract
AND I click Pre approve button
custom_expected: THEN the contract status updates to preapproved

title: As BOC, I want to put a contract on hold when it is pending investigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND I have opened a terms accepted contract [from clipboard or Contract History]
custom_steps: WHEN I click on 'pending investigation' on this contract
custom_expected:
THEN the contract updates to pending investigation
AND contract is removed from clipboard
AND reloads in view mode but still fully editable by BOC

title: As BOC, I want to pre-approve a 1st yr intl contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN I open a terms accepted Contract
AND I attempt to pre approve it
custom_expected: THEN the following rule checks must be done [linked story]

title: As BOC, I want the player to get added to the roster when I accept terms on his 1st yr intl contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have located a players 1st year intl contract in Terms Submittted
custom_steps: WHEN I move his contract to Terms Accepted
custom_expected:
THEN player is added to the team roster
AND a pro player profile is created [even though the ama one stille xists]
AND player history entry is created

title: As BOC, I can accept terms for a first year intl contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user accepts terms for a first year Intl contract
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can return a Terms Submitted contract. See [185802](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/185802)
AND BOC can accept terms on a contract. See [185805](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/185805)
AND Club can track TA and TS contracts. See [185806](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/185806)
Repeat all rule checks when going from TS > TA. See
[186211](http://mobilebuild01.dev.mlbam.com/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/186211)

title: UAT Update: Rule 5.24, As Club, I want to be BLOCKED if more than 12 players have been signed for next year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Club
custom_steps:
WHEN a 1st year contract is being signed for next year (see Beginning in year field in Add A), 
AND the current date is on or after July 1st
AND and there are already 12 or more players on this affiliate's roster with Roster status of "Signed for Next Year"
AND on "Submit"
custom_expected: THEN a HARD ERROR shows "You have surpassed the twelve man limit for first year players signed for next season" (This has been updated)
